com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.ui.v5.voice.polly

Class PollyPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.ui.v5.voice.polly.PollyPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InstructionPlayer

    public class PollyPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements InstructionPlayer

    Will retrieve synthesized speech mp3s from Amazon's AWS Polly Service (Requires a valid AWS Cognito Pool ID)

    Will queue each instruction and play them sequentially up until the queue is empty.

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public void play(java.lang.String instruction)
        Description copied from interface: InstructionPlayer
        Will play the given string instruction. If a voice instruction is already playing or other instructions are already queued, the given instruction will be queued to play after.
        Specified by:
        play in interface InstructionPlayer
        Parameters:
        instruction - voice instruction to be synthesized and played.

      • setMuted

        public void setMuted(boolean isMuted)
        Description copied from interface: InstructionPlayer
        Will determine if voice instructions will be played or not.

        If called while an instruction is currently playing, the instruction should end immediately and any instructions queued should be cleared.

        Specified by:
        setMuted in interface InstructionPlayer
        Parameters:
        isMuted - true if should be muted, false if should not

      • isMuted

        public boolean isMuted()
        Specified by:
        isMuted in interface InstructionPlayer
        Returns:
        true if currently muted, false if not

      • onOffRoute

        public void onOffRoute()
        Description copied from interface: InstructionPlayer
        Used in off-route scenarios to stop current instruction (if playing) and voice a rerouting cue.
        Specified by:
        onOffRoute in interface InstructionPlayer

        public void onDestroy()
        Description copied from interface: InstructionPlayer
